about.heading: Why I created
about.paragraph1: I'm a developer passionate about building products and sharing knowledge. My programming journey started from curiosity about how web applications work.
about.paragraph2: is my personal space where I showcase products I've built and share knowledge and experience learned from real-world projects. This is not just a portfolio but also where I experiment with new technologies and share my learning journey.
